# REST API Guidelines - Shared Short Form

Full guidelines are in demoulas.common.restful-api-guidelines.instructions.md.

Rules

-   Use resource nouns and correct HTTP methods.
-   Use kebab-case paths and plural resources.
-   Return ProblemDetails for errors.
-   Use pagination for list endpoints.
